title: Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life
itunes:title: Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life
description:
Leaders, if you’re looking to lead powerful, positive change in yourself or your organization, it can be hard to know where to start. John Maxwell says that everything begins with a thought, which is why leaders need to examine their thinking. What you think determines what you do and who you are.

In this episode, John Maxwell teaches how changing your thinking can change your life. After John’s lesson, Mark Cole and Traci Morrow discuss how they implement John’s principles into their own life, and they also offer you some real-world application.

Our BONUS resource for this episode is the “Change Your Thinking, Change Your Life Worksheet,” which includes fill-in-the-blank notes from John’s teaching. You can download the worksheet by visiting MaxwellPodcast.com/Think and clicking “Download the Bonus Resource.”

References:

Watch this episode on Youtube!

Thinking for a Change by John C. Maxwell (use code PODCAST at checkout for 15% off this week only)

CLEAR by Maxwell Leadership

The John Maxwell Leadership Podcast in Spanish ((Podcast de Liderazgo de John Maxwell por Juan Vereeken)

The John Maxwell Online Store
